abstract: India reports that its coast guard had intercepted a suspicious Pakistan-based fishing boat at sea, but when Indian officers approached the vessel to investigate, four men aboard the boat set off an explosion and vessel was destroyed by fire; Pakistani officials say report is hoax but are investigating.
lead_paragraph: Pakistan denies the Indian Defense Ministry’s account of intercepting a suspicious Pakistan-based boat in the Arabian Sea.
snippet: Pakistan denies the Indian Defense Ministry’s account of intercepting a suspicious Pakistan-based boat in the Arabian Sea.

headline.main: India Says Men on Pakistani Boat Set Off Explosion in Arabian Sea
headline.print_headline: India: Pakistani Boat Explodes When Stopped at Sea, Officials Say
